Oinkingdeath, Blade of the Pig King HAM
5 5 Item - Weapon Item
1
Non-pig allies can’t wield Oinkingdeath, Blade of the Pig King. Whenever the wielder becomes tapped, create an Omen token in your event queue.
Omen HAM
0 Token Event - Omen Event
1 On Trigger: Choose one — • Turn all cards in target player’s study face up. • Put target card in a study into its owner’s discard pile.
Steal and Resell HAM
1 1 Action Action
1 Put all cards in your study into your market.
Boaratio, the Poet HAM
0 Survivor Survivor
1 Stamina Regen = 2 Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Boaratio, the Poet’s hunger by 1.
William, the Survivalist HAM
0 Survivor Survivor
1 Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 2 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate William, the Survivalist’s hunger by 2.
Biscuit HAM
1 1 Item - Food Item
1 Biscuit enters tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Biscuit: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 2. Untap it.
Tea HAM
1 1 Item - Food Item
1 Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Tea: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 2. Put an endurance counter on it.
Coffee HAM
1 1 Item - Food Item
1 Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Coffee: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 4. Remove an endurance counter from it for each 1 satiation over its hunger.
Bacon HAM
1 1 Item - Food Item
1 Bacon enters tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Bacon: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 3.
Great Prophecy HAM
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Create two Omen tokens in your event queue.
Doom Foretold HAM
2 2 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Turn all cards in all studies face up. Create an Omen token in your event Queue.
Time Shift HAM
7 7 Action Action
1 Trigger all events in your event queue in your event phase this turn.
Famine Approaches HAM
3 3 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Put the top four cards of your deck into your discard pile. This turn, whenever a card leaves your discard pile, create a Decay token in your event queue.
Decay HAM
0 Token Event - Decay Event
1 On Trigger: Each opponent removes 1 endurance counter from a permanent they control.
Food HAM
0 Token Item - Food Item
1 Food enters tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Food: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 1.
Berry Bush HAM
1 1 Structure Structure
1 Tap: Put a berry counter on Berry Bush. Tap, Remove a berry counter from Berry Bush: Create a Food token.
Tower of Efficiency HAM
7 7 Structure Structure
1 While researching, after you put a card into your hand and a card on the bottom of your deck, put a card remaining in your study into your hand.
Destiny Fulfilled HAM
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Put any number of cards from your study into your discard pile.
Ruin HAM
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Each opponent removes 1 endurance counter from two permanents they control.
Wasteful Profiteering HAM
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Restock Ruin three times. (Create a card named Ruin in your market.)
Lucky Find HAM
2 2 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Reveal a card from your hand. Restock that card’s name. (Create a card named that card’s name in your market.)
Pseudoscience Data HAM
1 1 Action Action
1 Research.
Pseudoscientific Advancement HAM
3 3 Action Action
1 Research twice.
History Unfolding HAM
3 3 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Each player researches twice. Each opponent who did so discards three cards from their hand.
Siege of Oinksbury Castle HAM
2 2 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Put an endurance counter on each Pig ally you control. They gain hunger 2 until end of turn. (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.)
Rot HAM
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 2. (They remove 2counters from Foods they control.)
Knightly Duel HAM
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Put an endurance counter on each ally in play that’s wielding a weapon.
Pseudoscientific Prediction HAM
1 1 Action Action
1 Research. Create an Omen token in your event queue.
Iron Fist HAM
1 1 Action Action
1 Draw a card. If target opponent played no cards during their last turn, create two Food tokens.
Refind HAM
3 3 Action Action
1 Put target card from your discard pile into your hand.
Sponteneity HAM
3 3 Action Action
1 Set aside the top two cards of your deck. You may play them this turn. If you can no longer play them, put them into your discard pile.
Vandalism HAM
1 1 Action Action
1 Choose one — • Restock Ruin. (Create a card named Ruin in your market.) • Trigger up to two events named Ruin in your event queue.
Bake Biscuits HAM
1 1 Action Action
1 Restock Biscuit twice. (Create a card named Biscuit in your market.)
Call to Oinks HAM
4 4 Action Action
1 Until end of turn, Pig allies you control gain “Tap, Remove an endurance counter from this ally: Create a Decay token in your event queue.”
Call to Arms HAM
2 2 Action Action
1 Untap each ally you control that’s holding a weapon.
Influence of Famine HAM
4 4 Action Action
1 Draw a card for each hunger counter on Survivors in play.
Ominous Spire HAM
7 7 Structure Structure
1 If an endurance counter would be removed from a permanent you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Ominous Spire instead. If a permanent you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Ominous Spire instead. Whenever one or more endurance counters are removed from Ominous Spire, create an Omen token in your event queue.
